org.apache.hive.hcatalog.streaming

Interface RecordWriter

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractRecordWriter, DelimitedInputWriter, StrictJsonWriter, StrictRegexWriter
    Deprecated. 
    as of Hive 3.0.0, replaced by RecordWriter

    @Deprecated
public interface RecordWriter

           byte[] record)
    throws StreamingException
        Deprecated. 
        Writes using a hive RecordUpdater
        Parameters:

        record - the record to be written
